cloud-init:
#cloud-config

---
bootcmd:
- dev=$(blkid -tLABEL=config-2 -odevice)
- mount_dir=$(mktemp -d /tmp/tmp.XXXXXX)
- start_action_file=${mount_dir}/qcloud_action/TencentCloudRun.sh
- action_file=${mount_dir}/qcloud_action/action.sh
- mount $dev $mount_dir
- cp -f $start_action_file /var/lib/cloud/scripts/per-boot/
- chmod 755 /var/lib/cloud/scripts/per-boot/TencentCloudRun.sh
- mkdir -p /usr/local/qcloud/action
- cp -f $action_file /usr/local/qcloud/action
- umount $mount_dir
- rm -rf $mount_dir
chpasswd:
    expire: false
    list:
    - root:$1$umDHtLqv$daQL93qdUKFT9HpNJ9OiO/
disable_root: false
fqdn: VM_0_3_centos
growpart:
    devices:
    - /
    ignore_growroot_disabled: false
    mode: auto
hostname: VM_0_3_centos
manage_etc_hosts: template
manage_resolv_conf: true
ntp:
    servers:
    - ntpupdate.tencentyun.com
resolv_conf:
    nameservers:
    - 183.60.83.19
    - 183.60.82.98
runcmd:
- systemctl reload-or-restart ntpd.service &
- service ntpd restart &
- rm -f /run/cloud-init/.instance-id &
- hostnamectl --transient set-hostname VM_0_3_centos &
- hostnamectl --static set-hostname VM_0_3_centos &
- hostnamectl --pretty set-hostname VM_0_3_centos &
- mkdir /tmp/0d47a433-4c18-45fa-9f93-49978ae4415a
- mount /dev/cdrom /tmp/0d47a433-4c18-45fa-9f93-49978ae4415a
- cp -r /tmp/0d47a433-4c18-45fa-9f93-49978ae4415a/qcloud_init/ /
- umount /dev/cdrom /tmp/0d47a433-4c18-45fa-9f93-49978ae4415a
- rm -rf /tmp/0d47a433-4c18-45fa-9f93-49978ae4415a
- sh /qcloud_init/cvm_init.sh >/dev/null 2>&1 &
ssh_pwauth: false
users:
- default
-   lock_passwd: false
    name: root
    ssh_authorized_keys:
    - ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAADAQABAAAAgQDDi3LuRl6GLN+cEQk8TBAGHe9t+whTFoZfYtSxAeO/2wvVdnZjzfS/tKjCcxccdySn7fl+cb0hngwdb5GmGDp5FrpaX+f2mDKfcBrEK33mDY27vcupy9U+q0KhiPAGQM04ch3uOm1A/4TlfkJ3bUcU4vJkSwhQqA+fICxedPmmOw==
        skey_299734
write_files:
-   content: dXVpZCA9IDBkNDdhNDMzLTRjMTgtNDVmYS05ZjkzLTQ5OTc4YWU0NDE1YQ==
    encoding: b64
    owner: 'root: root'
    path: /etc/uuid
    permissions: '0666'
-   content: 
    encoding: b64
    owner: 'root: root'
    path: /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Epel.repo
    permissions: '0644'
-   content: 
    encoding: b64
    owner: 'root: root'
    path: /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo
    permissions: '0644'
...
